title: How do new Worlds Missions work? After the third one I'm not getting any new ones.
body: I did the first three missions, then I got a mission to do more missions, but there are none. So..  are they only for people who pay?

replies.body: Just as Lew said, each week there should be new Missions arriving. You can pick up the Pass in the store to access even more missions as well if you still want even more missions!
There will be more missions each week during worlds and if you buy the pass it will give some extra missions each week.
